ygData.subject: Survey and Females
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry to have to post this to the list. I went to the link for the survey, and it said there were no active surveys. Please tell me that I am not doing
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry to have to post this to the list.
I went to the link for the survey, and it said there
were no active surveys. Please tell me that I am not
doing something wrong.

About the clothes on women thing. I laugh at my ranger
friend because when we die (happens a lot), she comes
back wearing MORE clothes than when she is fully
dressed in her banded armor. Oh, and not all of the
women are eye catching. I personally have never looked
twice at a female ogre, troll, halfling, dwarf, or
gnome. :)

I play a female high elf enchanter as well, and I have
had my share of harrassing remarks. I have been
proposed to, as well as propositioned. I try to
disregard the bad remarks (made easier by the fact
that I know I am not a female IRL). But the times when
people walk up to me and praise my beauty is a lot of
fun. :)

That's all for now.

Mandibal
16th Song
Fighting Kerrans on Odus

Eadilie
8th Enchanting Level
Fighting away the masses of 13 year olds in Freeport



=====
